scenario_text.value:
Human buildings sure are weird. Just look at
all this big stuff.

Labramon, don’t you know what these are?
They’re desks and chairs!

I know what they’re called! I just don’t see
why they’re all so big!

I can’t imagine they’d be comfortable to sit
in or to eat off of.

Oh yeah, now that you mention it, they are
kinda big for you guys to use.

That’s what I’m saying! Why isn’t there
a desk that I could use?

(She’d...probably get upset if I suggested
she eat on the floor.)

We need to find some food so we can all eat
together!
